text: Barutwa ba babedi ba fitlhela Jesu a sa ntse a alafa balwetse ba malwetse a a farologanyeng, a fodisa digole le difofu ebile a kgoromeletsa ntle mewa e e maswe. Batlhotsi ga ba tlhole ba tlhotsa! Balepero ba setse ba fodisitswe! Bosusu ba a utlwa! Baswi ba a rula! Mme bahumanegi ba utlwa Mafoko a a Molemo.
